name: Lantern Light
description: Rays of holy light flash from your eyes. You can fire 1 ray per 2 caster levels, but no more than 1 ray per round. You must succeed on a ranged touch attack to hit a target. The target takes 1d6 points of damage from each ray. Abstinence Component: You must abstain from sexual intercourse for 24 hours before casting this spell.
